plot: The bride and master Pai Mei engage in the twist dance. A spoof on two classic Tarantino scenes.
title: Beatrix Kiddo & Master Pai Mei's Twist
plot_es: The bride and master Pai Mei engage in the twist dance. A spoof on two classic Tarantino scenes.
original_name: Beatrix Kiddo & Master Pai Mei's Twist
plot_en: The bride and master Pai Mei engage in the twist dance. A spoof on two classic Tarantino scenes.
